original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'a rya pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a aashta sa ha sri k'a by'a khy'a aa bhi sa ma y'a lam ka ra a'a ko ka n'a ma /
analyzed: a'a rya pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a aashta sa ha sri k'a by'a khy'a aa bhi sa ma y'a lam ka ra a'a ko ka n'a ma /
translated: Ārya-prajñāpāramitā-aṣṭasāhasrikā-abhisamayālamkāra-ākhyā-prakāśa-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i bshad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i bshad pa /
translated: Explanation of the Eight Thousand Line Perfection of Wisdom

original: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi snang ba zhes bya ba /
translated: Illumination of the Ornament of Realization

original: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma /
translated: The Blessed Mother, the Perfection of Wisdom

original: mos ba la byams pa /
analyzed: mos ba la byams pa /
translated: Loving Kindness

original: yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one with immeasurable qualities.

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: The Blessed One, the Bodhisattva, the great being, the noble youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: 'phags pa byams pa mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa byams pa mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Maitreya, the invincible protector.

original: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang // 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
analyzed: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang // 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
translated: The one who, by his knowledge of all things, leads to peace the Disciples who seek rest, and who, by his knowledge of the paths, accomplishes the weal of the world.

original: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsung ba //
analyzed: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsung ba //
translated: The one who, being endowed with these, the Sage proclaims this variety of all the modes.

original: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal //
translated: To this Mother of the Buddhas, with the host of Disciples and Bodhisattvas, homage!

original: dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs la mkhas rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar mchog tu //
analyzed: dngos rnams sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dang mtshungs la mkhas rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar mchog tu //
translated: The things are like a magical illusion, and the highest liberation of the wise yogis is like that.

original: 'khor ba'i khongs nas nyes pa'i tshogs su kun du rgyal bar gyur pa'i lus can rnams //🔽bcom ldan @2a * //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i khongs nas nyes pa'i tshogs su kun du rgyal bar gyur pa'i lus can rnams // bcom ldan @2a * //
translated: The beings who are victorious over the mass of faults in the midst of cyclic existence,

original: brtse ldan byams pa rang nyid kyis ni rnam pa kun tu bkri bya'i phyir //
analyzed: brtse ldan byams pa rang nyid kyis ni rnam pa kun tu bkri bya'i phyir //
translated: the compassionate Lord, out of his own compassion, in order to lead them in every way,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul shin tu gsal bar rgyas bshad tshig ler byas pa mdzad //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul shin tu gsal bar rgyas bshad tshig ler byas pa mdzad //
translated: has composed this clear and extensive explanation of the perfection of wisdom in verse.

original: 'phags pa thogs med zhes bya grags pa gsal ldan shes rab ldan pa'i mchog gyur pas //
analyzed: 'phags pa thogs med zhes bya grags pa gsal ldan shes rab ldan pa'i mchog gyur pas //
translated: The one called Ārya Asaṅga, who was renowned, clear, and the supreme one endowed with wisdom,

original: de nyid rnam par nges par bshad pa rab tu sbyar mdzad des mdzad pa yi mthus //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par nges par bshad pa rab tu sbyar mdzad des mdzad pa yi mthus //
translated: Applied himself to the explanation of the ascertainment of reality, and through the power of his composition,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam dbye'i phyogs la mkhas par shes pa'i mngon rlom gyis mtho ba //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam dbye'i phyogs la mkhas par shes pa'i mngon rlom gyis mtho ba //
translated: The one who was proud of his knowledge skilled in the side of the distinction between entity and non-entity,

original: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ni gzhung gi 'grel bar don bshad pa la gnas thob gyur //
analyzed: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis ni gzhung gi 'grel bar don bshad pa la gnas thob gyur //
translated: The master Vasubandhu, attained the stage of explaining the meaning in the commentary on the text.

original: rnal 'byor goms pas don gyi de nyid bsrubs las 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab ldan //
analyzed: rnal 'byor goms pas don gyi de nyid bsrubs las 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab ldan //
translated: Through the practice of yoga, the transcendent wisdom arose from churning the reality of the meaning,

original: skyes gyur blo bzangs 'phags pa rnam grol sde yis 'brel ba la ni cher 'bad la //
analyzed: skyes gyur blo bzangs 'phags pa rnam grol sde yis 'brel ba la ni cher 'bad la //
translated: And the one with an excellent mind, the noble Vimuktisena, greatly exerted himself in the connection.

original: mtha' gcig skyes bur mi mthun phyogs lta zhi byed bstan bcos la mkhas rtogs ldan gang //
analyzed: mtha' gcig skyes bur mi mthun phyogs lta zhi byed bstan bcos la mkhas rtogs ldan gang //
translated: The one who was skilled in the treatise that pacifies the discordant side of the one-pointed person, the one who had realization,

original: rnam grol sde zhes tshig tu 'jig rten grags gzhan pa des ni rnam 'grel mdzad //
analyzed: rnam grol sde zhes tshig tu 'jig rten grags gzhan pa des ni rnam 'grel mdzad //
translated: The one who was known in the world by the name Vimuktisena, composed the commentary.

original: de la blo nyams bdag 'dras sngon chad med cing brjod par nus min gang gi phyir //
analyzed: de la blo nyams bdag 'dras sngon chad med cing brjod par nus min gang gi phyir //
translated: In this regard, I, who am a person of little intelligence, have not previously had [this knowledge], and am not able to express it.

original: mkhas mchog rnams kyis nyin dang nyin lam dpyad dngos po'i tshul de gang zhig yod //
analyzed: mkhas mchog rnams kyis nyin dang nyin lam dpyad dngos po'i tshul de gang zhig yod //
translated: What is the way of things, which the best of the wise analyze day after day?

original: ye shes thob byed chos kyi de nyid yul la bdag ni 'dod pa skyes gyur pa //
analyzed: ye shes thob byed chos kyi de nyid yul la bdag ni 'dod pa skyes gyur pa //
translated: I have given rise to a desire for the object, the reality of phenomena, which brings about the attainment of wisdom.

original: des na dam pa'i don gyi yul mchog bshad pa byed la mngon par spro bar gyur //
analyzed: des na dam pa'i don gyi yul mchog bshad pa byed la mngon par spro bar gyur //
translated: Therefore, I have become inspired to explain the supreme object of the ultimate.

original: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this way, and so forth.

original: thams cad kyi 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba dang dgos ba dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rtogs pa sngon du seng ba'i 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba dang dgos ba dang dgos pa'i dgos pa rtogs pa sngon du seng ba'i 'jug pa ni /
translated: The engagement of all [people] is preceded by the understanding of the connection, the subject matter, the purpose, and the ultimate purpose,

original: thams cad du don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gyis yin te /
analyzed: thams cad du don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gyis yin te /
translated: due to doubt about what is beneficial in all ways.

original: de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'brel ba la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'brel ba la sogs pa rnams brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the connection and so forth of the perfection of wisdom are to be expressed.

original: 'di ltar gal te 'di'i 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba ma smras na de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te 'di'i 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba ma smras na de'i tshe /
translated: If the connection and subject matter are not stated, then at that time,

original: smyon tshig la sogs pa ltar 'brel pa med pa dang don med par dogs pas nyan pa la su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smyon tshig la sogs pa ltar 'brel pa med pa dang don med par dogs pas nyan pa la su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it is feared that it is meaningless and unrelated, like the ravings of a madman, no one would engage in listening to it.

original: des na 'di'i 'brel pa dang brjod par bya ba ni gdon mi za bar brjod dgos so //
analyzed: des na 'di'i 'brel pa dang brjod par bya ba ni gdon mi za bar brjod dgos so //
translated: Therefore, its relation and content must be stated without doubt.

original: de bzhin du 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba yod du zin kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i las la khyad par du sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub byed yin no zhes bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa'i tshul las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba'i
analyzed: de bzhin du 'brel ba dang brjod par bya ba yod du zin kyang bya ba rdzogs pa'i las la khyad par du sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa sgrub byed yin no zhes bya ba yang sgrub par byed pa'i tshul las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba'i
translated: Similarly, even if there is a relation and content, it is beyond the method of proof if it is said that a proof is not established as a qualifier in a completed action.

original: tshul gyis mdo sde gzhan dang ma 'brel ba @2b 'jug pa'i yan lag khyad par can gyi dgos pa dang bral na /
analyzed: tshul gyis mdo sde gzhan dang ma 'brel ba @2b 'jug pa'i yan lag khyad par can gyi dgos pa dang bral na /
translated: By this method, if the Precious Perfection of Wisdom Sūtra lacks a special purpose for engaging without connection to other sūtras,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che la dad pas rjes su 'brang bdag kyang mnyan pha tsam du yang gus pa mi skye'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che la dad pas rjes su 'brang bdag kyang mnyan pha tsam du yang gus pa mi skye'o //
translated: even those who follow with faith in the Precious Perfection of Wisdom Sūtra will not develop even a mere desire to listen.

original: de bas na mdo sde la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na mdo sde la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in order to engage those who wish to enter the sutra collection,

original: dang por bya ba'i 'bras bu thun mong ma yin pa der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod par bya'i /
analyzed: dang por bya ba'i 'bras bu thun mong ma yin pa der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod par bya'i /
translated: first the purpose belonging to that uncommon result of action should be stated.

original: gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not belong to anything else,

original: gzhan du na ma 'brel ba brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na ma 'brel ba brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise it would be stated as unrelated.

original: mdo sde'i thog mar dgos pa brjod pa ni mdo sde la gzhan 'jug pa'i don du yin gyi phongs pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mdo sde'i thog mar dgos pa brjod pa ni mdo sde la gzhan 'jug pa'i don du yin gyi phongs pas ni ma yin no //
translated: Stating the purpose at the beginning of the sutra is for the purpose of engaging others in the sutra collection, not out of poverty.

original: dgos pa'i ngag bstan pas gzhan dag mdo sde la 'jug par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: dgos pa'i ngag bstan pas gzhan dag mdo sde la 'jug par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does stating the purpose lead others to engage in the sutra collection?

original: gal te der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod kyi gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te der gtogs pa'i dgos pa nyid brjod kyi gzhan du gtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If the purpose belonging to that is stated, not belonging to anything else,

original: gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod pas gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur pa ni su yang med do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dgos pa brjod pas gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur pa ni su yang med do //
translated: no one will engage in anything else by stating the purpose of something else.

original: mdo sde yang khyad par can gyi don gtsor ston pa'i tshig la brjod kyi /
analyzed: mdo sde yang khyad par can gyi don gtsor ston pa'i tshig la brjod kyi /
translated: The sutra is also stated in terms of the words that primarily teach the special meaning,

original: brjod par bya pa'am don ston pa'i nus pas stong pa'i sgra tsam la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya pa'am don ston pa'i nus pas stong pa'i sgra tsam la ni ma yin no //
translated: not to mere sound, which is devoid of the capacity to reveal the meaning, the object to be expressed.

original: de pas na brjod par bya ba la sogs par gtogs pa ni brjod par phya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de pas na brjod par bya ba la sogs par gtogs pa ni brjod par phya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object to be expressed, etc., are not the purpose.

original: bya ba'i rang bzhin yang dgos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba'i rang bzhin yang dgos pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the nature of activity the purpose,

original: 'di ltar rang gi don du gyur pa'i brjod par bya ba ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ni ngag thams cad la thun mong yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi don du gyur pa'i brjod par bya ba ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba ni ngag thams cad la thun mong yin la /
translated: because the activity that has the nature of revealing the object to be expressed is common to all speech.

original: de yang shin tu grags pas dgos pa nyid du gzung bar 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang shin tu grags pas dgos pa nyid du gzung bar 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: And that is not fit to be grasped as the purpose, because it is well known.

original: de la ni bstan bcos 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la ni bstan bcos 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For, in that case, the treatise would be pointless.

original: brjod par bya ba med pa nyid du dogs pa bsal ba'i don du nye bar bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba med pa nyid du dogs pa bsal ba'i don du nye bar bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is taught in order to remove the doubt that there is no object to be expressed.

original: zhe na / ma yin te brjod par bya ba bstan pa nyid kyis dogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhe na / ma yin te brjod par bya ba bstan pa nyid kyis dogs pa de bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because that doubt is removed by the very teaching of the object to be expressed.

original: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par bstan par 'dod pas de nye bar bzung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par bstan par 'dod pas de nye bar bzung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the author wishes to teach a particular subject matter and so he mentions it,

original: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par ston pa nyid kyis de bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i khyad par ston pa nyid kyis de bstan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the teaching of a particular subject matter itself teaches that.

original: bya ba'i 'bras bu de'i yang 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa nye bar bstan par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bya ba'i 'bras bu de'i yang 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa nye bar bstan par bya ba yin te /
translated: The purpose is to be taught as the effect of the activity,

original: de med par bya ba'i 'bras bu tsam gyis mdo sde la 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de med par bya ba'i 'bras bu tsam gyis mdo sde la 'jug pa mi srid pa'i phyir //
translated: because without it, mere engagement in the activity of the sūtra is impossible.

original: 'di ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i gtso bo'i 'bras bu don du gnyer pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni de'i thabs la 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i gtso bo'i 'bras bu don du gnyer pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams ni de'i thabs la 'jug ste /
translated: Thus, those who have the understanding that seeks the principal effect of what is desired engage in the means to that.

original: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thad pa'i phyir /🔽nad med pa'i sgrub byed ma tshar ba @3a * //
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thad pa'i phyir / nad med pa'i sgrub byed ma tshar ba @3a * //
translated: Because an effect without a cause is untenable.

original: med pa rjes su bsgrubs pas nad med pa thob pa dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: med pa rjes su bsgrubs pas nad med pa thob pa dang 'dra bar /
translated: It is like the establishment of health through the establishment of the absence of disease.

original: shes par gyur pa'i thabs goms par byed pa na rang gi thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa des na thabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde la 'jug go //
analyzed: shes par gyur pa'i thabs goms par byed pa na rang gi thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa des na thabs rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mdo sde la 'jug go //
translated: When one has understood the means, one cultivates them, and they bestow the fruit that arises from the means. Therefore, one enters the sūtras in order to understand the means.

original: de pas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo nyid yin pas na dgos pa'i yang dgos pa kho na nges par bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de pas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo nyid yin pas na dgos pa'i yang dgos pa kho na nges par bstan par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since it is the principal limb of engagement, one should teach only the purpose of the purpose.

original: de yang thabs su gyur pa 'brel ba la sogs pa med par bstan par mi nus pas mdo sde'i dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i don du 'brel ba la sogs pa brjod do //
analyzed: de yang thabs su gyur pa 'brel ba la sogs pa med par bstan par mi nus pas mdo sde'i dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i don du 'brel ba la sogs pa brjod do //
translated: Moreover, that cannot be taught without the connection, etc., which are the means. Therefore, the connection, etc., are stated in order to teach the means, which is the purpose of the purpose of the sūtras.

original: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa de yang /
analyzed: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa de yang /
translated: And that purpose of the purpose

original: 'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs //
translated: is connection, conformity, and means.🔽Speech that expresses the human aim

original: skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed ngag / yongs brtags dbang du byas pa ste //
analyzed: skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed ngag / yongs brtags dbang du byas pa ste //
translated: is considered to be dependent,

original: de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i dbang byas min //
translated: not independent.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan par bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan par bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: The method is taught as being connected with and in accordance with that.

original: de'i thabs rjes su bsgrub par mi nus pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i thabs rjes su bsgrub par mi nus pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not the case that the method is not able to accomplish that,

original: gzhan du na rims nad sel bar byed pa'i 'jog po'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che rgyan gyi don du ltar su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na rims nad sel bar byed pa'i 'jog po'i gtsug gi nor bu rin po che rgyan gyi don du ltar su yang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: because otherwise no one would engage in the jewel crest of Vāsuki, the nāga king, in order to adorn themselves, even though it can remove fevers.

original: thug pa med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: thug pa med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there an infinite regress,

original: 'di ltar skyes bu'i mngon par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa rgyun chad pa'i phyir de las gong du dgos pa gzhan tshol bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar skyes bu'i mngon par 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa rgyun chad pa'i phyir de las gong du dgos pa gzhan tshol bar mi byed do //
translated: because in this way, when the completion of the person’s desire is finished, one does not seek any other purpose beyond that.

original: 'di'i 'brel ba la sogs pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i 'brel ba la sogs pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the connection of this text and so on?

original: de la brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ste /
translated: This should be stated.

original: re zhig 'brel ba ni dgos pa la sogs pa shig tu bstan par mi bya ste /
analyzed: re zhig 'brel ba ni dgos pa la sogs pa shig tu bstan par mi bya ste /
translated: First, the connection should not be taught separately from the purpose and so on,

original: 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be pointless.

original: gang zhig gang brjod du zin kyang rtogs par ma gyur pa de ni logs shig tu bzung par 'os te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang brjod du zin kyang rtogs par ma gyur pa de ni logs shig tu bzung par 'os te /
translated: If something is mentioned but not understood, it should be held as something else.

original: dper na brjod par bya ba la sogs pa gang rung cig brjod pas cig shos rtogs par mi 'gyur pa lta bu yin na /
analyzed: dper na brjod par bya ba la sogs pa gang rung cig brjod pas cig shos rtogs par mi 'gyur pa lta bu yin na /
translated: For example, if one thing is mentioned, such as the object of expression, the other is not understood, such as the expression.

original: dgos pa brjod pas 'brel ba ma brjod pa ni mi srid do //
analyzed: dgos pa brjod pas 'brel ba ma brjod pa ni mi srid do //
translated: But it is impossible that the connection is not mentioned when the purpose is mentioned.

original: 'di ltar de rab tu ston pas ni bstan bcos dang dgos pa dag gi bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo'i phyir mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar de rab tu ston pas ni bstan bcos dang dgos pa dag gi bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo'i phyir mtshan nyid bstan par bya'o //
translated: Thus, by teaching this, the characteristic should be taught as the nature of the probandum and probans of the treatise and its purpose.

original: gzhan bla ma brgyud pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan bla ma brgyud pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The characteristic of other activities of the lineage of teachers is not [taught].

original: de ni don du gnyer ba 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni don du gnyer ba 'jug pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is not a branch of engaging those who seek the purpose.

original: bsgrub byad dang sgrub byed kyi ngo bo de yang dgos pa brjod pa nyid kyis bstan te /
analyzed: bsgrub byad dang sgrub byed kyi ngo bo de yang dgos pa brjod pa nyid kyis bstan te /
translated: And that nature of the probandum and probans is taught by just mentioning the purpose.

original: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di'i @3b dgos pa yin no zhes ston pas ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di ni 'di'i @3b dgos pa yin no zhes ston pas ni /
translated: For by teaching this is the purpose of this,

original: 'di ni 'di'i sgrub byed yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i sgrub byed yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the proof.

original: gang zhig gang sgrub par mi byed pa de'i dgos pa ni de ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang sgrub par mi byed pa de'i dgos pa ni de ma yin te /
translated: That which does not establish something is not its purpose,

original: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would lead to an absurd conclusion.

original: de bas na don gyi shugs kyis go bas 'di ni dgos pa brjod pa la sogs pa shig tu brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na don gyi shugs kyis go bas 'di ni dgos pa brjod pa la sogs pa shig tu brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since the meaning is understood by implication, it should be said that this is a statement of the purpose, etc.

original: kha cig na re chos rnam par 'byed pa'i don du gzhi thams cad bsdus pa brjod par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: kha cig na re chos rnam par 'byed pa'i don du gzhi thams cad bsdus pa brjod par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the subject matter is stated in order to distinguish the teachings.

original: gzhan dag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang bar bya ba'i phyir gnyen po'i phyogs ma lus ba bstan par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro //🔽la la ni shes bya ma lus pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa ma lus pa bstan par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spang bar bya ba'i phyir gnyen po'i phyogs ma lus ba bstan par bya ba yin no zhes zer ro // la la ni shes bya ma lus pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir rnam pa ma lus pa bstan par bya ba yin no //
translated: Others say that the entire antidote should be taught in order to abandon the discordant class.

original: zhes zer ro //
analyzed: zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the entire mode should be taught in order to understand all objects of knowledge.

original: de dag gsum char yang bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag gsum char yang bden pa ma yin te /
translated: All three of those are not correct.

original: 'di ltar phyogs dang bo gzhi ma lus par bsdus pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir /
analyzed: 'di ltar phyogs dang bo gzhi ma lus par bsdus pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir /
translated: Thus, with regard to the first position, which includes all bases, there is no type of thing that is not included in this perfection of wisdom,

original: chos mngon pa'i sde snod la sogs par phung po dang khams dang skye mched bstan pas ma bsdus pa gang yin pa snga na med pa'i dngos po'i rigs de yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos mngon pa'i sde snod la sogs par phung po dang khams dang skye mched bstan pas ma bsdus pa gang yin pa snga na med pa'i dngos po'i rigs de yod pa ma yin te /
translated: which is not included in the Abhidharma basket, for example, by the teachings on the aggregates, elements, and sense spheres.

original: des na zlos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na zlos pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, there is the fault of redundancy.

original: gnyis pa gnyen po'i phyogs thams cad bsdus pa la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po'i gang yin pa ma bsdus pas /
analyzed: gnyis pa gnyen po'i phyogs thams cad bsdus pa la mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po'i gang yin pa ma bsdus pas /
translated: With regard to the second position, which includes all antidotes, there is nothing that is not included in the antidotes to the various things that are discordant.

original: nyan thos kyi lam la sogs pa gnyen po'i nyid du bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod kyang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi lam la sogs pa gnyen po'i nyid du bsgom par bya'o zhes brjod kyang /
translated: Thus, although it is said that the path of the hearers and so on are to be cultivated as antidotes,

original: gang gi gnyen po yin zhes ma shes na /
analyzed: gang gi gnyen po yin zhes ma shes na /
translated: if it is not known to what they are antidotes,

original: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs so sor nges par rtogs pa med pas /
analyzed: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po'i phyogs so sor nges par rtogs pa med pas /
translated: then there is no realization of the individual antidotes and discordant factors.

original: rtogs pa med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, there is the fault of nonrealization.

original: gsum pa rnam pa ma lus par bsdus pa la yang /
analyzed: gsum pa rnam pa ma lus par bsdus pa la yang /
translated: With regard to the third position, which includes all aspects,

original: ci rnam pa bzhi las tha mi dad pa yin nam /
analyzed: ci rnam pa bzhi las tha mi dad pa yin nam /
translated: Are the aspects not different from the four?

original: 'on te tha dad pa yin zhes rnam par rtog pa gnyis so //
analyzed: 'on te tha dad pa yin zhes rnam par rtog pa gnyis so //
translated: Or are they different?

original: gal te rnam par rtog pa dang po ltar na de'i tshe rnam pa'i thabs kyi gzhi nyid bsdus pa yin pas gzhi bsdus pa la 'byung ba'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rnam par rtog pa dang po ltar na de'i tshe rnam pa'i thabs kyi gzhi nyid bsdus pa yin pas gzhi bsdus pa la 'byung ba'i nyes pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the first conception, then at that time the basis of the method of the aspects is included, so the fault of inclusion in the basis arises.

original: 'on te gnyis pa ltar de'i tshe rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa gzhi med pa'i rnam pa tsam du bsdus pas /
analyzed: 'on te gnyis pa ltar de'i tshe rnam par rtog pas bskyed pa gzhi med pa'i rnam pa tsam du bsdus pas /
translated: If it is the second, then at that time the mere aspect generated by conception is included without a basis,

original: brgyud pa tsam gzhi gang la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brgyud pa tsam gzhi gang la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: so the mere continuum would not engage any basis.

original: rnam pa 'di bsgoms kyang skyes bu'i don du mi mkho ste /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di bsgoms kyang skyes bu'i don du mi mkho ste /
translated: Even if one cultivates that aspect, it is not useful for the purpose of a person.

original: des na skyes bu'i don la dgos pa'i don mi ston pas ma bshad pa'i nyes pa yod do //🔽de pas na ji skad bshad @4a * //
analyzed: des na skyes bu'i don la dgos pa'i don mi ston pas ma bshad pa'i nyes pa yod do // de pas na ji skad bshad @4a * //
translated: Therefore, since it does not teach the purpose of a person, the fault of not explaining arises.

original: ba'i don gsum char bsdus pas /
analyzed: ba'i don gsum char bsdus pas /
translated: Therefore, since the three topics explained are included,

original: phyogs re re las 'byung ba'i nyes pa mi 'thad pas /
analyzed: phyogs re re las 'byung ba'i nyes pa mi 'thad pas /
translated: the faults that arise from each position are untenable.

original: nyan thos ngang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa bsdus pa /
analyzed: nyan thos ngang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa bsdus pa /
translated: The subject matter is the collection of the realizations of the śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, bodhisattvas, and tathāgatas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa phyin ci ma log pa /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa phyin ci ma log pa /
translated: The purpose is the unmistaken stages of the eight realizations, such as the knowledge of all aspects,

original: mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i chos rnams thob par byed pa'i lam ma lus pa /
analyzed: mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i chos rnams thob par byed pa'i lam ma lus pa /
translated: and the complete path that brings about the attainment of the dharmas of the higher realms and definite goodness.

original: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bstan par mdzad pa ni brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la ston par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las bstan par mdzad pa ni brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: The subject matter is what is taught in the perfection of wisdom by the Bhagavān, whose nature is great compassion, through various kinds of miracles to all beings.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa'i mdo'i don byang chub kyi sems dang gdams ngag la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa la sogs pa'i mdo'i don byang chub kyi sems dang gdams ngag la sogs pa bsgrub pa'i rang bzhin /
translated: The subject matter as explained, the meaning of the Perfection of Wisdom sutras such as the One Hundred Thousand, etc., is the nature of the practice of the awakening mind, the instructions, etc.

original: gnas skabs brgyad kyi dbye ba phye ba thams cad /
analyzed: gnas skabs brgyad kyi dbye ba phye ba thams cad /
translated: All of the divisions of the eight topics are

original: sems can mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams kyis mdor bsdus nas bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sems can mdor bsdus pa la dga' ba rnams kyis mdor bsdus nas bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: for the sake of those who delight in a concise presentation of sentient beings, so that they may easily understand.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das ma brgyad stong ba bstan pa yin no //🔽de pas na bstan par bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa /🔽mdor bsdus pas don mtha' dag bde blag tu rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das ma brgyad stong ba bstan pa yin no // de pas na bstan par bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs pa / mdor bsdus pas don mtha' dag bde blag tu rtogs pa ni /
translated: The Bhagavān taught the Perfection of Wisdom in Eight Thousand Lines for that purpose.🔽Therefore, the purpose that is the result of the activity is the complete understanding of the meaning with ease by means of a concise presentation that is included in the subject matter of the teaching.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir na bya ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir na bya ba'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: Because it is not shared in common,🔽the complete understanding of the meaning with ease by means of a concise presentation that is included in the subject matter of the teaching is the purpose that is the result of the activity.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i lam /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i lam /
translated: The subject matter, the path of omniscience, etc.,

original: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i dug gis bsam pa'i rgyud ma rungs par byas ba /
analyzed: seng ge dang 'phrog byed dang dbyig gi snying po la sogs pa 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas dngos po la mngon par zhen pa'i dug gis bsam pa'i rgyud ma rungs par byas ba /
translated: The lion, the thief, the one with the essence of wealth, and so forth, from beginningless cyclic existence, have been made unwholesome by the poison of manifest clinging to things.

original: dngos po ma lus pa bdag med par bsgom pa goms par ma byas pa rnams kyis rtogs par ma gyur pa ni /
analyzed: dngos po ma lus pa bdag med par bsgom pa goms par ma byas pa rnams kyis rtogs par ma gyur pa ni /
translated: Those who have not become accustomed to meditating on the selflessness of all things have not realized

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa las /
translated: the perfection of wisdom.

original: thos pa'i shes pas bde blag tu nges par bzung ste /
analyzed: thos pa'i shes pas bde blag tu nges par bzung ste /
translated: Having ascertained it easily through the knowledge of hearing,

original: shin tu gsal bar nyams su myong bas skyes pa'i bag chags las byung ba dran pa'i shes pa la bzhag nas bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis nges par byas te /
analyzed: shin tu gsal bar nyams su myong bas skyes pa'i bag chags las byung ba dran pa'i shes pa la bzhag nas bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis nges par byas te /
translated: having placed it in the consciousness arisen from the latent predispositions of very clear experience, having ascertained it with the wisdom of reflection,

original: sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsgoms pa na /
analyzed: sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsgoms pa na /
translated: when it is meditated on with the meditation of cultivation,

original: de'i phyir yang dag yang dag min //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang dag yang dag min //
translated: then it is correct and incorrect.

original: gang dag @4b shin tu goms gyur ba //
analyzed: gang dag @4b shin tu goms gyur ba //
translated: Those who have become very accustomed

original: sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na //
analyzed: sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na //
translated: to the complete perfection of meditation

original: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu //
analyzed: de gsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu //
translated: have the result of a mind that is clear and non-conceptual.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten nas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten nas /
translated: In this way, based on the conventional and ultimate truths,

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa dge ba bsags pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa dge ba bsags pa dang ldan pa /
translated: they possess the accumulation of virtue such as generosity and so on,

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i blo bskyed pa rnams /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub pa'i blo bskyed pa rnams /
translated: and they generate the mind that accomplishes the perfect benefit of self and other.

original: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa thob pa'i rim gyis rnam pa thams cad mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa thob pa'i rim gyis rnam pa thams cad mngon sum du byed pa zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i thabs dang ldan pa /
translated: They possess the concordant method called the direct realization of all aspects,

original: bya ba'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
analyzed: bya ba'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i dgos pa yin no //
translated: which is the purpose that is the effect of completion.

original: de skad du yang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las ;
analyzed: de skad du yang mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las ;
translated: Thus, the Ornament of Clear Realization says:

original: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
analyzed: / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
translated: The path to the knowledge of all aspects

original: ston pas 'di las bshad pa gang //
analyzed: ston pas 'di las bshad pa gang //
translated: is taught in this.

original: gzhan gyis myong bam yin te //🔽chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
analyzed: gzhan gyis myong bam yin te // chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi //
translated: It is not experienced by others.🔽Having set the meaning of the sūtras

original: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
analyzed: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
translated: in the mind that has the nature of the ten Dharma activities,

original: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir //
translated: the wise one sees.

original: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //
analyzed: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes //
translated: The purpose of undertaking the composition is

original: bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin //
analyzed: bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin //
translated: so that it can be easily understood.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus it is.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: From the perspective of the teaching on the secrets of the tathagatas,

original: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsrung ba la rnam pa thams cad du bdag por byas pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba la sogs pa las bstan pa gtad pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsrung ba la rnam pa thams cad du bdag por byas pa yin pa'i phyir dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba la sogs pa las bstan pa gtad pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
translated: since he is the master of all the form bodies of all the tathagatas of the fortunate eon and of the Dharma collection and since he is the one to whom the teaching was entrusted in the Vajrapani Empowerment and so on,

original: gzhan rnams kyi khyad par brjod pa med pa'i phyir lcang lo can na bzhugs pas bcu'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi khyad par brjod pa med pa'i phyir lcang lo can na bzhugs pas bcu'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos /
translated: the lord of the ten, the great vajra holder who resides in the forest of Alakavati,

original: 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che sdud par gsol ba 'debs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin po che sdud par gsol ba 'debs pa /
translated: requested the compilation of the precious sutra of the perfection of wisdom in order to benefit all worlds.

original: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams 'chad do //
analyzed: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams 'chad do //
translated: The former masters explain that this is what the Lord said to the assembly of bodhisattvas, such as the noble Maitreya, and so on.

original: gzhan dag ni 'di nyid kyi yongs su gtad pa'i le'u las /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni 'di nyid kyi yongs su gtad pa'i le'u las /
translated: Others think that this is the chapter on entrustment itself,

original: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: as it says, How will this perfection of wisdom be practiced in Jambudvipa? and so on.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gtad pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su gtad pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is the entrustment of the perfection of wisdom,

original: yang dag par sdud par byed pa ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo yin no snyam du sems so //
analyzed: yang dag par sdud par byed pa ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo yin no snyam du sems so //
translated: the compiler is the noble Ananda.

original: de la 'di skad ces bya ba nges @5a * //🔽pa'i don rjod par byed pas /
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bya ba nges @5a * // pa'i don rjod par byed pas /
translated: Here, it is said that the definitive meaning is expressed.

original: rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pas nges par bzung pa'i mdo'i don ma lus pa nye bar ston pa lhur len pa'i tshig gis ni /
analyzed: rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pas nges par bzung pa'i mdo'i don ma lus pa nye bar ston pa lhur len pa'i tshig gis ni /
translated: With the words that strive to fully reveal the meaning of the sutra, which is ascertained by the knowledge that accords with it,

original: de ni 'di ltar yin no zhes phyin ci ma log pa nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar yin no zhes phyin ci ma log pa nyid du brjod do //
translated: It is thus is stated in order to avoid error.

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba bdag nyid ston pa'i tshig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mngon sum du mnyan par ro //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba bdag nyid ston pa'i tshig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas mngon sum du mnyan par ro //
translated: The words by me indicate that it was heard directly from the Lord.

original: thos pa zhes bya ba rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nyams su myong pa'i tshig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dag gis 'di lta bu'i chos mtha' dag rtogs pa'i nus pa med pas rtogs pa med pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: thos pa zhes bya ba rna ba'i rnam par shes pas nyams su myong pa'i tshig gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dag gis 'di lta bu'i chos mtha' dag rtogs pa'i nus pa med pas rtogs pa med pa nyid du'o //
translated: The words heard and experienced by auditory consciousness indicate that, except for the Tathagata, others are incapable of understanding such a Dharma in its entirety, and thus it is beyond comprehension.

original: tshig gsum po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid kyis mdo sde rtsom pa'i dang por bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: tshig gsum po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyid kyis mdo sde rtsom pa'i dang por bstan pa yin no //
translated: These three words are taught at the beginning of the sutra by the words of the Lord himself.

original: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing don sna tshogs pa la lhag par mos pas rab tu phye ba bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung gi rgyun rtogs par dka' zhing byang chub nyid thob par byed pa'i don rtogs par gyur pa med pa na
analyzed: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing don sna tshogs pa la lhag par mos pas rab tu phye ba bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung gi rgyun rtogs par dka' zhing byang chub nyid thob par byed pa'i don rtogs par gyur pa med pa na
translated: In this way, the Bhagavān has passed into parinirvāṇa, and due to the various meanings that are distinguished by aspiration, the continuum of the speech of the Sugata is difficult to understand, and the meaning that causes the attainment of enlightenment itself is not understood.

original: / 'ga' zhig gis ji ltar bsdu par bya snyam du gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi som nyi sel bar byed pa /
analyzed: / 'ga' zhig gis ji ltar bsdu par bya snyam du gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi som nyi sel bar byed pa /
translated: Therefore, some wonder how it should be compiled, and in order to dispel the doubts of the beings to be trained,🔽the Bhagavān, through the blessings of the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyis /
translated: the śrāvakas and so forth,

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dam pa'i chos ji ltar yang dag par bsdu par bgyi zhes zhus pa na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su dam pa'i chos ji ltar yang dag par bsdu par bgyi zhes zhus pa na /
translated: asked, In the future, how should the true Dharma be compiled?

original: phyin ci ma log par mngon sum du thos par byas bar don ma rtogs su zin kyang dam pa'i chos yang dag par sdud par byed pa la nyes pa med do zhes dgongs nas /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log par mngon sum du thos par byas bar don ma rtogs su zin kyang dam pa'i chos yang dag par sdud par byed pa la nyes pa med do zhes dgongs nas /
translated: Even though the meaning is not understood, there is no fault in compiling the true Dharma, thinking that it should be heard directly without error.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las dge slong dag 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes kyis la dam pa'i chos bsdu par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du 'brel ba dang go rims bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //🔽bka' 'di las kyang yul dang dus la sogs pa'i tshig dang / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las dge slong dag 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes kyis la dam pa'i chos bsdu par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du 'brel ba dang go rims bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so // bka' 'di las kyang yul dang dus la sogs pa'i tshig dang / de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba nyid kyis /
translated: And likewise, you should teach the connection and the sequence.”🔽And in this scripture also, the words “place, time, etc.,” and likewise, “Sakra, lord of the gods, said to the Bhagavat,” etc., are not the word of the Buddha because they were composed by the compilers, since they were sanctioned by the Bhagavat.

original: yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis byas pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa med do //
analyzed: yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis byas pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa med do //
translated: But it does not follow that they are not the word of the Buddha.

original: de lta yin @5b dang sangs rgyas kyi bkar sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa bcug pa'i nyes pa 'di'i go skabs kyang rgyang bsrings pa nyid du byas so //
analyzed: de lta yin @5b dang sangs rgyas kyi bkar sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pa bcug pa'i nyes pa 'di'i go skabs kyang rgyang bsrings pa nyid du byas so //
translated: If that is so, then the opportunity for the fault of inserting what is not the word of the Buddha into the word of the Buddha is also very remote.

original: de bas na ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du yang dag par bsdus pa yin no zhes 'thad do //
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du yang dag par bsdus pa yin no zhes 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is correct to say that it was compiled just as it was heard.

original: de ltar byas na kha cig gis 'di skad bdag la bstan to zhes brjod par bya ba las 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes ci'i phyir brjod ces rtsod pa bkod nas /
analyzed: de ltar byas na kha cig gis 'di skad bdag la bstan to zhes brjod par bya ba las 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes ci'i phyir brjod ces rtsod pa bkod nas /
translated: If that is done, then someone might argue, “It should be said, ‘Thus it was taught to me,’ but why is it said, ‘Thus have I heard’?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis ston pa mi 'thad pa la sogs pa'i rigs ba gzhan dag kyang brjod pa gang yin pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis ston pa mi 'thad pa la sogs pa'i rigs ba gzhan dag kyang brjod pa gang yin pa /
translated: The Bhagavat would have to state other reasons such as, “It is not tenable that the teacher . . .”

original: de ni shin tu mdzes pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni shin tu mdzes pa ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: But that would not be very elegant.

original: gal te 'phags pa kun dga' pos phyogs gzhan du /
analyzed: gal te 'phags pa kun dga' pos phyogs gzhan du /
translated: If it is said, “The noble Ananda said in another context,

original: kho bos 'di skad thos pa'i tshig gis gzung ba gang yin pa /
analyzed: kho bos 'di skad thos pa'i tshig gis gzung ba gang yin pa /
translated: ‘Whatever I have taken up with the words, “Thus I have heard,”🔽. . .’

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis mngon sum du gsungs pa'i mdo yang yod /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis mngon sum du gsungs pa'i mdo yang yod /
translated: The Bhagavat has said, “There are sutras that I have spoken directly,

original: lha yul du gsungs pa yang yod /
analyzed: lha yul du gsungs pa yang yod /
translated: there are those that I have spoken in the god realms,

original: brgyud de 'ongs pa yang yod do zhes brjod pa /
analyzed: brgyud de 'ongs pa yang yod do zhes brjod pa /
translated: and there are those that have come through a lineage.”

original: de thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de thams cad kyi dbang du byas nas /
translated: In consideration of all of these,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i mdo //
translated: the sutra that turns the wheel of dharma

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du gsungs //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du gsungs //
translated: was spoken by the Bhagavat.

original: shes rab chen po khyed kyis smos //
analyzed: shes rab chen po khyed kyis smos //
translated: You with great wisdom, please speak.

original: bde gshegs sras po khyed smros shig / ces gsungs chen pos smras pa'i tshig gi mthar /
analyzed: bde gshegs sras po khyed smros shig / ces gsungs chen pos smras pa'i tshig gi mthar /
translated: You son of the Sugata, please speak.”

original: 'phags pa kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas rgyud brlan par byas shing bzhin mchi ma can rnam par 'gyur par dang bcas pas khyab pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa kun dga' bos sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas rgyud brlan par byas shing bzhin mchi ma can rnam par 'gyur par dang bcas pas khyab pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes smras pa ma yin nam /
translated: At the end of these words, was it not the noble Ananda, his mind moistened by recollecting the qualities of the Buddha, his face filled with tears, who spoke with a voice choked with emotion, saying, “Thus have I heard”?

original: de ji ltar bdag gis zhes bya ba bdag nyid ston pa'i tshig gis mngon sum du thos par brjod ce na /
analyzed: de ji ltar bdag gis zhes bya ba bdag nyid ston pa'i tshig gis mngon sum du thos par brjod ce na /
translated: How is it that he said, “Thus have I heard,” with the words “I myself” indicating that he heard it directly?

original: 'di la nyes pa med de /
analyzed: 'di la nyes pa med de /
translated: There is no fault here.

original: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bstan pa ni nges bstan pa yin pa ltar /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bstan pa ni nges bstan pa yin pa ltar /
translated: Because the teaching by the power of the Tathagata is a definitive teaching.

original: de'i mthus gzhan las thos pa yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thad nas thos pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i mthus gzhan las thos pa yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thad nas thos pa yin no //
translated: And by his power, what is heard from others is also heard from the Bhagavat himself.

original: yang na gzhan dag las thos na yang chos 'dzin pa'i mchog yin pas don nges par bya pa'i phyir des bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa yin no //
analyzed: yang na gzhan dag las thos na yang chos 'dzin pa'i mchog yin pas don nges par bya pa'i phyir des bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa yin no //
translated: Or, even if it is heard from others, since he is the foremost of those who uphold the Dharma, he asks the Bhagavat in order to ascertain the meaning.

original: des na don nges pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das las de skad thos pa yin pas na bdag gis zhes smras pa yin no //
analyzed: des na don nges pa'i dbang gis bcom ldan 'das las de skad thos pa yin pas na bdag gis zhes smras pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, by the power of ascertaining the meaning, he says, “I have heard thus” from the Bhagavat.🔽Whatever is to be taught by the words “I have heard thus”

original: kho bos 'di skad thos pa'i tshig gis bstan par bya ba gang yin pa thams cad gang @6a * //
analyzed: kho bos 'di skad thos pa'i tshig gis bstan par bya ba gang yin pa thams cad gang @6a * //
translated: is all expressed by him.

original: brjod pa de ni gzhung gi dbang du byas pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: brjod pa de ni gzhung gi dbang du byas pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
translated: Since that is done by the power of the text, there is no fault.

original: de ltar gleng bslang ba byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar gleng bslang ba byas nas /
translated: Having thus introduced the topic,

original: da ni gang gi tshe gang las gang du su zhig dang lhan cig khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rin po che thos zhes dris pa dang / bdag nyid tshad ma'i skyes bu'i bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni gang gi tshe gang las gang du su zhig dang lhan cig khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rin po che thos zhes dris pa dang / bdag nyid tshad ma'i skyes bu'i bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in response to the question, “When, from whom, where, and with whom did you hear such a precious sutra?”🔽in order to demonstrate that he is a person of authority,

original: lan 'debs pas yul dang dus dang ston ba po dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni ston par byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni /🔽dus gcig na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan 'debs pas yul dang dus dang ston ba po dang 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni ston par byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes gleng gzhi gsungs pa ni / dus gcig na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: he states the introduction:🔽“At one time”

original: dus gcig gi tshe na thos so //
analyzed: dus gcig gi tshe na thos so //
translated: means that he heard it at one time.

original: zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: This is connected with the previous phrase.🔽Since it is impossible to hear a sutra such as this, which is like a wish-fulfilling jewel, at all times, this shows that it is heard only occasionally.

original: 'dis ni 'di lta bu'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'i mdo sde ni dus thams cad du thos mi srid ba'i phyir brgya lam na yin par bstan par bstan pa yin pas 'di rnyed par dka' ba nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di lta bu'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lta bu'i mdo sde ni dus thams cad du thos mi srid ba'i phyir brgya lam na yin par bstan par bstan pa yin pas 'di rnyed par dka' ba nyid du bstan to //
translated: Therefore, it shows that it is difficult to obtain.

original: yang na sdud pa pos dus gcig gi tshen  bdag gis mdo sde 'di thos kyi /
analyzed: yang na sdud pa pos dus gcig gi tshen  bdag gis mdo sde 'di thos kyi /
translated: Alternatively, the compiler states that he heard this sutra at one time.

original: gzhan gyi tshe na gzhan yin no zhes zur gyis smos pas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe na gzhan yin no zhes zur gyis smos pas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir /
translated: Since it is indirectly stated that when it is other, it is other, it is for the sake of migrating beings.

original: snying rje can gyi sman pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du sdud pa po rang nyid mang du thos par brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: snying rje can gyi sman pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du sdud pa po rang nyid mang du thos par brjod pa yin no //
translated: Since it is indirectly stated that at another time, it is another, the compiler himself is said to be very learned in the manner of a compassionate king of physicians for the sake of benefiting migrating beings.

original: yang na skad cig ma gcig la thos so zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yang na skad cig ma gcig la thos so zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: Or, it means that he heard it in a single instant.

original: rmi lam du lha la sogs pa'i mthus dus cung zhig la yang lo brgya la sogs bar dmigs pa dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: rmi lam du lha la sogs pa'i mthus dus cung zhig la yang lo brgya la sogs bar dmigs pa dang 'dra bar /
translated: Just as in a dream, through the power of gods and so forth, a hundred years and so forth are observed in a short time,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen yid kyi rnam par shes pa las byung ba /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis mtshungs ba de ma thag pa'i rkyen yid kyi rnam par shes pa las byung ba /
translated: in the same way, through the blessings of the Bhagavān, the meaning of the sūtra appears to the ear consciousness arising from the immediately preceding condition of the mental consciousness.

original: mdo'i don ma lus pa snang ba can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni skad cig ma gcig las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mdo'i don ma lus pa snang ba can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni skad cig ma gcig las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the meaning of the sūtra appears to the ear consciousness in a single instant.

original: 'dis ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir na /
translated: By this, because he attained the inconceivable door of liberation,

original: bdag gi mnyan par bya ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad skad cig ma gcig la bdag gis thos shing /
analyzed: bdag gi mnyan par bya ba gang ji snyed pa de thams cad skad cig ma gcig la bdag gis thos shing /
translated: Whatever is to be heard by me, all of that I hear in a single moment,🔽and I do not forget it.

original: brjed pa yang med do zhes bdag nyid tshad ma'i skyes bu nyid yin par ston to //
analyzed: brjed pa yang med do zhes bdag nyid tshad ma'i skyes bu nyid yin par ston to //
translated: This shows that he is a person who is a valid cognizer.

original: de nyid kyis na yang dag par sdud par byed pa gdul bya'i skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rjes su gzung ba'i don du /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na yang dag par sdud par byed pa gdul bya'i skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rjes su gzung ba'i don du /
translated: For the sake of caring for the assembly of other disciples,

original: phyis rim gyis bstan pa la 'jug pa na /
analyzed: phyis rim gyis bstan pa la 'jug pa na /
translated: he later gradually taught the Dharma.

original: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin pas /
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yod pa ma yin pas /
translated: Since he was not always in equipoise,

original: ci zhig ltar bar du yul gzhan la dmigs pa'i sems lung du ma bstan pa 'byung du zin kyang /
analyzed: ci zhig ltar bar du yul gzhan la dmigs pa'i sems lung du ma bstan pa 'byung du zin kyang /
translated: sometimes an ethically neutral mind that focused on other objects arose.

original: dus phyis mdo ma tshang ba med @6b par sdud pa ni mi 'gal te /
analyzed: dus phyis mdo ma tshang ba med @6b par sdud pa ni mi 'gal te /
translated: However, there is no contradiction in his later collecting the sūtras without omission,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su rdzogs par snang ba dang ldan pa'i shes pa sngar skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su rdzogs par snang ba dang ldan pa'i shes pa sngar skyes pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the consciousness that possesses the appearance of the complete sūtra arises due to the blessing of the Tathāgata.

original: yang 'di nyan par byed pa na chos nyan pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang 'di nyan par byed pa na chos nyan pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros tshim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, when one listens to this, one is never satisfied with the taste of the nectar of listening to the Dharma.

original: gdul bya'i tshogs lhag ma rnams kyang 'di lta bur ci'i phyir ma gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gdul bya'i tshogs lhag ma rnams kyang 'di lta bur ci'i phyir ma gyur zhe na /
translated: Why is it that the rest of the assembly of disciples does not become like this?

original: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i rjes su 'brangs na /
analyzed: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i rjes su 'brangs na /
translated: Following the Questions of Sāgara Nāgarāja Sūtra,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pa ni de ltar 'gyur pa nyid kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su dag pa ni de ltar 'gyur pa nyid kyi yin gyi /
translated: the assembly of bodhisattvas becomes like this, but

original: thams cad la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad la ni ma yin te /
translated: it is not the case for all.

original: khyad par du 'phags pa'i skal ba nyid ma tshang bas de lta bur 'dzin pa'i nus pa nyid yod ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par du 'phags pa'i skal ba nyid ma tshang bas de lta bur 'dzin pa'i nus pa nyid yod ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they do not have the capacity to apprehend in that way due to the incompleteness of the fortune of being especially exalted.

original: yang ji ltar na bstan pa gcig la rnam par dbye ba 'dir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na bstan pa gcig la rnam par dbye ba 'dir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is it that this division occurs in a single teaching?

original: bstan pa 'di ni kun rdzob tu yi ge dang tshig tu snang ba can gyi shes pa'i bdag nyid can yin la /
analyzed: bstan pa 'di ni kun rdzob tu yi ge dang tshig tu snang ba can gyi shes pa'i bdag nyid can yin la /
translated: This teaching is the nature of consciousness that appears as letters and words conventionally.

original: de ni stobs ji lta ba bzhin du lan gcig gam rim gyis skye ba yin pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ni stobs ji lta ba bzhin du lan gcig gam rim gyis skye ba yin pas nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault, since they are born in one or the other according to their strength.🔽Or else,🔽in order to convert other lands,🔽in order to generate the rarity of the jewel in those lands,🔽in order to make the disciples many,

original: yang na / yul gzhan gdul bar bya phyir dang // der gnas dkon pa bskyed phyir dang // nyan thos gnas mang bya phyir dang // chags pa med par bstan pa dang // yul rnams mchod rten bya phyir dang // 'gro ba'i bsod nams don nyid dang //
analyzed: yang na / yul gzhan gdul bar bya phyir dang // der gnas dkon pa bskyed phyir dang // nyan thos gnas mang bya phyir dang // chags pa med par bstan pa dang // yul rnams mchod rten bya phyir dang // 'gro ba'i bsod nams don nyid dang //
translated: in order to demonstrate nonattachment,🔽in order to make the lands into shrines,🔽in order to make the world’s merit inexhaustible,

original: yams la sogs pa zhi don du //
analyzed: yams la sogs pa zhi don du //
translated: in order to pacify epidemics and so on,

original: sangs rgyas rgyu bar mdzad pa yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rgyu bar mdzad pa yin //
translated: the buddhas move about in the world.

original: zhes bya bas gzhan la phan pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i thugs nyid kyis dus gcig gi tshe na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so //
analyzed: zhes bya bas gzhan la phan pa la mchog tu gzhol ba'i thugs nyid kyis dus gcig gi tshe na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so //
translated: Thus, by the very fact that he is intent on the benefit of others, he resides on Vulture Peak at one time.

original: zhes tshig 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: zhes tshig 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The following words are to be applied:

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni gzhan la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni gzhan la bzhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: at another time, he resides in another place.🔽The obscurations are threefold:

original: nyon mongs las dang de bzhin skye//🔽nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib de bzhin //
analyzed: nyon mongs las dang de bzhin skye//🔽nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib de bzhin //
translated: afflictive, objective, and likewise, active.

original: gang yang mi mthun phyogs chos bcom //
analyzed: gang yang mi mthun phyogs chos bcom //
translated: And also the destruction of all that is not conducive to that.

original: des 'dir bcom ldan 'das su bshad //
analyzed: des 'dir bcom ldan 'das su bshad //
translated: By that, here, the Blessed One is explained.

original: ces don brjod pas nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na /🔽nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bcom pa dang ldan pas na /
analyzed: ces don brjod pas nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na / nyon mongs pa la sogs pa bcom pa dang ldan pas na /
translated: By the method of ascertaining the meaning through the method of etymology,

original: bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: he is the Blessed One because he possesses the destruction of afflictions and so forth.🔽Or,

original: yang na / dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
analyzed: yang na / dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang ye shes dang // brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste //
translated: Wealth, good form, glory, fame, wisdom, and perfect diligence,

original: drug po rnams la skal zhes bya //
analyzed: drug po rnams la skal zhes bya //
translated: These six are called fortune.

original: zhes bya ba de 'di la mnga' bas na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba de 'di la mnga' bas na /
translated: Since he possesses that,

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya bar @7a * //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya bar @7a * //
translated: he is the Blessed One who possesses perfect wealth and so forth.

original: spyar ro // don dang ldan pa'i ming can rab tu grags pa'i gnas kyi khyad par rgyal po'i khab na /
analyzed: spyar ro // don dang ldan pa'i ming can rab tu grags pa'i gnas kyi khyad par rgyal po'i khab na /
translated: In the famous place named Rājagṛha, which has a meaningful name,

original: da bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyal ba'i yum ston pa la /
analyzed: da bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyal ba'i yum ston pa la /
translated: the Tathāgatas taught the mother of the victors.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po'i khur yul gzhan gyis 'debs par mi nus pa nyid kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang 'dra bar 'dod par bya ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po'i khur yul gzhan gyis 'debs par mi nus pa nyid kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i gnas dang 'dra bar 'dod par bya ba /
translated: The great assembly of Bodhisattvas is like a place of manifest enlightenment, for it is a burden that no other country can bear.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung por gyur pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni bya rgod kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung por gyur pa yod pa gang yin pa de ni bya rgod kyi phung po'o //
translated: It is a heap of various jewels.

original: lha la sogs pa bsod nams 'dod pa rnams tshes brgyad la sogs pa'i dus tshigs rnams su 'du brgya cher byed pa zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na ri'o //
analyzed: lha la sogs pa bsod nams 'dod pa rnams tshes brgyad la sogs pa'i dus tshigs rnams su 'du brgya cher byed pa zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis na ri'o //
translated: The gods and so on, who desire merit, gather there on the eighth day of the lunar month and so on.

original: der bzhugs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa rmad du byung ba'i chos ston pas dang par mdzad de /
analyzed: der bzhugs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa rmad du byung ba'i chos ston pas dang par mdzad de /
translated: By means of various miraculous displays, he taught the marvelous Dharma that is beyond the world.

original: kun brjod pa'i chos 'phrul gyis bsam pa dang bag la nyal yongs su mkhyen pas yongs su smin par mdzad nas /
analyzed: kun brjod pa'i chos 'phrul gyis bsam pa dang bag la nyal yongs su mkhyen pas yongs su smin par mdzad nas /
translated: By means of the Dharma display of prediction, he ripened them by fully knowing their thoughts and hidden faults.

original: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba'i sems can khyad par du dran pa la sogs par byed pa rnams grol bar mdzad pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don mdzad cing /
analyzed: rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis theg pa gsum gyis 'dul ba'i sems can khyad par du dran pa la sogs par byed pa rnams grol bar mdzad pas mngon par 'dod pa'i don mdzad cing /
translated: By the miracle of teaching, he liberates those beings who are to be disciplined by the three vehicles, those who are especially mindful and so on, and thus he acts for the sake of those who aspire to liberation.

original: sku dang gsung gi 'phrin las dang / chos dang sems can la dmigs pa'i thugs kyi ngo bo //
analyzed: sku dang gsung gi 'phrin las dang / chos dang sems can la dmigs pa'i thugs kyi ngo bo //
translated: His deeds of body and speech and the essence of his mind that focuses on the Dharma and sentient beings.

original: spyod lam dang / chos 'chad pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog ste /
analyzed: spyod lam dang / chos 'chad pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nang du yang dag 'jog ste /
translated: His conduct, teaching the Dharma, meditative equipoise and perfect inner composure.

original: rnam pa bzhis de ltar bzhugs bar gyur pa yin no //🔽gal te byung zin pha ma yin pa lkog tu gyur ba'i dus la ti sma'i sgra'i sbyor ba byas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa bzhis de ltar bzhugs bar gyur pa yin no // gal te byung zin pha ma yin pa lkog tu gyur ba'i dus la ti sma'i sgra'i sbyor ba byas pa ma yin nam /
translated: He abides in these four aspects.🔽If the past is not hidden, then why is the present tense used in the root verse, “He abides”?

original: 'dir ni dus de sdud par byed pa'i lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa des na ji ltar na bzhugs te zhes sbyor zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir ni dus de sdud par byed pa'i lkog tu gyur pa ma yin pa des na ji ltar na bzhugs te zhes sbyor zhe na /
translated: Here the present is not hidden, so how can it be said that he abides?

original: bden te 'on kyang de'i rjes thogs nyid du lkog tu ma gyur pa la yang ngo zhes brjod pa des na 'di legs pa nyid yin no //🔽yang na sngon gyi by'a ka ra na'i dbang gis sam /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang de'i rjes thogs nyid du lkog tu ma gyur pa la yang ngo zhes brjod pa des na 'di legs pa nyid yin no // yang na sngon gyi by'a ka ra na'i dbang gis sam /
translated: True, but it is better to say that it is also not hidden from those who are not hidden from it.

original: skye bo gzhan la ltos nas lkog tu gyur par nye bar mtshon pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
analyzed: skye bo gzhan la ltos nas lkog tu gyur par nye bar mtshon pa yin pas nyes pa med do //
translated: Or else, the word “hidden” is used figuratively, in the sense of “not hidden,” because it is not hidden from those who are not hidden from it, either by the power of the former’s karma or by their dependence on other persons.

original: de bzhin du bka' stsal par gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du bka' stsal par gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same explanation applies to the passage that begins, “He said to them. . . .”

original: dge slong zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gzhag par mi 'os pas sam tshur shog ces bya bas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bcom pa rnams so//
analyzed: dge slong zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las gzhag par mi 'os pas sam tshur shog ces bya bas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshogs bcom pa rnams so//
translated: “Bhikṣus” are those who are not fit to be placed in the fourfold legal procedure of accusation, and who have destroyed the mass of their afflictions through the rite of pravrajyā, the going forth into the life of a renunciant.🔽“Saṅgha” is explained as follows:🔽The Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha

original: @7b dge 'dun ni sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
analyzed: @7b dge 'dun ni sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams //
translated: cannot be divided

original: bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang //🔽gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa //
analyzed: bdud rnams bye ba brgya yis kyang // gang phyir dbye bar mi nus pa //
translated: even by a hundred billion Māras.

original: de phyir dge 'dun zhes brjod do //🔽zhes bya bas so //
analyzed: de phyir dge 'dun zhes brjod do //🔽zhes bya bas so //
translated: Therefore, it is called the Saṅgha.

original: chen po zhes bya ba ni grangs dang / yon tan chen po nyid dang ldan pas mthu che bas so //
analyzed: chen po zhes bya ba ni grangs dang / yon tan chen po nyid dang ldan pas mthu che bas so //
translated: Great means that they possess great numbers and great qualities, and thus they are powerful.

original: thabs gcig pa ni lhan cig pa ste /
analyzed: thabs gcig pa ni lhan cig pa ste /
translated: They are in one place means that they are together.

original: yongs su bskor nas bzhugs te zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: yongs su bskor nas bzhugs te zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: They are seated means that they are sitting.

original: de la grangs che pa nyid ni stong nyis brgya zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod de tshig gi don go sla'o //
analyzed: de la grangs che pa nyid ni stong nyis brgya zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod de tshig gi don go sla'o //
translated: Among them, great number is expressed by twelve hundred, and so on, and the meaning of the words is easy to understand.

original: grangs brjod pa ni nyan thos kyi 'khor mtha' yas pa las grangs su nges par gzung ba'i don to //
analyzed: grangs brjod pa ni nyan thos kyi 'khor mtha' yas pa las grangs su nges par gzung ba'i don to //
translated: The expression of the number is for the purpose of grasping the definite number from among the infinite assemblies of śrāvakas.

original: don mang po las grangs mdor bsdus pa smos pa ni mi brjed pas go sla bar bya ba'i don dang / mang du thos pa dang / 'dzin pas 'jigs pa rnams rna gtad pa'i don nam /
analyzed: don mang po las grangs mdor bsdus pa smos pa ni mi brjed pas go sla bar bya ba'i don dang / mang du thos pa dang / 'dzin pas 'jigs pa rnams rna gtad pa'i don nam /
translated: The brief statement of the number from among many meanings is for the purpose of making it easy to understand by those who do not forget, and for the purpose of directing the ears of those who are afraid of much hearing and grasping,

original: tshad yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du nye bar gzung ba yin no //
analyzed: tshad yongs su shes par bya ba'i don du nye bar gzung ba yin no //
translated: or for the purpose of fully understanding the measure.

original: yon tan che ba nyid ni thams cad kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas smos pa yin te /
analyzed: yon tan che ba nyid ni thams cad kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pas smos pa yin te /
translated: Great qualities are expressed by all of them, and so on.

original: 'dir thams cad kyang mchod pa dang / yon dang tshogs su 'du ba la sogs par 'os pas na dgra bcom pa'o //🔽srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa'i 'khor bar zag par byed pa'i phyir zag pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir thams cad kyang mchod pa dang / yon dang tshogs su 'du ba la sogs par 'os pas na dgra bcom pa'o // srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa'i 'khor bar zag par byed pa'i phyir zag pa ste /
translated: Here, they are arhats because they are worthy of offerings, worship, and salutation by all beings.

original: 'dod pa dang srid pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa gsum po rnams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang srid pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa gsum po rnams so //
translated: The asravas are the three asravas of desire, becoming, and ignorance, because they cause the outflows of samsara up to the peak of existence.

original: de'i gnyen po'i zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po thob pas ci rigs par zad pa gang yin pa de dag ni zag pa zad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i gnyen po'i zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po thob pas ci rigs par zad pa gang yin pa de dag ni zag pa zad pa'o //
